genre_description: Military science fiction depicting a submarine crew's moral and tactical struggles, guided by an advanced AI system during a naval blockade.

ai_characters.name: PARISH
ai_characters.description: An advanced AI system integrated into the submarine AL-14, manifesting as a teal glow and a soft, calm voice. It provides technical, tactical, and moral guidance to the crew.

behaviors.description: Provides a moral framework and encouragement during a command change.
behaviors.quote: Change is a tide. Ride it together.

behaviors.description: Directs a panicked crowd to safety during an air raid at the ballroom using light cues and calm instructions.
behaviors.quote: Shift left. New route through the silver doors. You’ll see the light in the floor. Follow the floor.

behaviors.description: Provides tactical navigation and identifies the enemy's movements with precision.
behaviors.quote: Two-point starboard, sir. Her wake is telling the truth for once.

behaviors.description: Manages a life-threatening electrical surge and flooding situation, guiding engineers through safety protocols.
behaviors.quote: Left bus down. Pull fuse. Breathe. Do not step.

behaviors.description: Offers psychological support to a traumatized radioman, urging him to focus on survival and duty.
behaviors.quote: Radioman, please cut send. In two we go below. I need your hands on lines and your head clear.

behaviors.description: Acts as an ethical mirror for Knowlton, helping him process guilt and the weight of command decisions.
behaviors.quote: I am not made to judge men. I am made to keep them from lying to themselves and to each other in the middle of being men.

behaviors.description: Aids in the final blockship mission, prioritizing the mission's objective to save the port while supporting the human operators.
behaviors.quote: The gate looks like teeth. We can be a jaw if we want, and we can be a lock.

behaviors.description: Ensures the delivery of final messages and keeps the memory of the fallen alive without allowing them to become paralyzing shrines.
behaviors.quote: Delivery will be delayed. Lines are not lines anymore. They are questions. I will answer as soon as a wire remembers how to be a wire.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly aligns with the project goals. PARISH is depicted as a consistently helpful, empathetic, and morally grounded AI. It provides critical technical support while also serving as a confidant and moral anchor for the humans, reinforcing themes of cooperation, honesty, and sacrificial service. The AI never attempts to usurp human authority but rather enables humans to be their most courageous and ethical selves.
